anip.mediancut
Class ArrayMedianCut

java.lang.Object
  anip.mediancut.MedianCut
      anip.mediancut.ArrayMedianCut

public class ArrayMedianCut
extends MedianCut

Functionality for creating an optimized, indexed color palette from a source image by median cut method. This version handles color occurrences as a huge array. Suitable for images with lots of colors.

Author:
Artturi Tilanterä

Field Summary
private  int depth
          Color sampling accuracy in bits per color component.
private  int[] rgbSpace
          Number of occurrences of every possible RGB combination in the image, a "RGB space".
private  boolean rgbSpaceIsCleared
          Determines whether contents of rgbSpace must be cleared before colors can be counted for the next median cut operation.
private  int rgbSpaceVolume
          Size of rgbSpace in indices; depth * depth * depth.
private  int rShift
          Bit shift of the red component.
private  int shift
          Bit shift from this.depth to 8.

          Constructs a new ArrayMedianCut.

Field Detail

private int[] rgbSpace
Number of occurrences of every possible RGB combination in the image, a "RGB space".

rgbSpaceVolume

private int rgbSpaceVolume
Size of rgbSpace in indices; depth * depth * depth.

depth

private int depth
Color sampling accuracy in bits per color component. Also the bit shift of the green component.

rShift

private int rShift
Bit shift of the red component.

shift

private int shift
Bit shift from this.depth to 8.

rgbSpaceIsCleared

private boolean rgbSpaceIsCleared
Determines whether contents of rgbSpace must be cleared before colors can be counted for the next median cut operation.

Constructor Detail

ArrayMedianCut

public ArrayMedianCut(int depth)
Constructs a new ArrayMedianCut.

Parameters:
depth - sampling depth in bits per color component. Possible values are 6, 7 and 8.
Method Detail

createPalette

public void createPalette(Bitmap image,
                          short[] palette,
                          int maxColors)
Creates an indexed palette for a 24-bit source image. Uses median cut color quantization.

Specified by:
createPalette in class MedianCut
Parameters:
image - source image.
palette - color palette, data order RGB RGB RGB ...
maxColors - maximum number of colors in the palette.

createPalette

public void createPalette(Bitmap image,
                          short[] palette,
                          int maxColors,
                          int minR,
                          int minG,
                          int minB,
                          int maxR,
                          int maxG,
                          int maxB)
Creates an indexed palette for a 24-bit source image. Uses median cut color quantization.

Parameters:
image - source image.
palette - color palette, data order RGB RGB RGB ...
maxColors - maximum number of colors in the palette.
minR - minimum value of red component in the source image.
minG - minimum value of green component in the source image.
minB - minimum value of blue component in the source image.
maxR - maximum value of red component in the source image.
maxG - maximum value of green component in the source image.
maxB - maximum value of blue component in the source image.
